body.raw:
### Overview The **DataTable** component is a powerful, flexible, and lightweight solution for rendering tabular data in your applications. Built on top of [ShadCN's DataTable component](https://ui.shadcn.com/docs/components/data-table) which uses [TanStack Table](https://tanstack.com/table), this component simplifies the process of creating dynamic tables with rich features. ##### Breakdown - Install Shadcn and dependant components - Install DataTable dependencies - Install DataTable
### Run the ShadCN CLI Run the shadcn-ui init command and setup your project with Shadcn.
```bash pnpm dlx shadcn@latest init ``` ### Add DataTable This will add DataTable & install it's required dependencies into your project.
```bash pnpm dlx shadcn@latest add https://uploadshad.nerfdesigns.com/registry/data-table.json ``` This uses the (new) ShadCN CLI. ### Thats it! You have successfully installed DataTable into your project. ðŸŽ‰ Now you can [start using DataTable in your Forms](/DataTable/). Alternatively, you can [learn how DataTable works under the hood]("/DataTable)
### Resources - Learn more about [ShadCN CLI](https://ui.shadcn.com/docs/cli) - Learn more about [ShadCN Data Table](https://ui.shadcn.com/docs/components/data-table) - Learn more about [Tanstack Table](https://tanstack.com/table), useful for more custom integrations/use cases.
